descrip: In order to run protractor tests on multiple browsers, Protractor offers multiCapabilities configuration option. These options should be defined as an array of objects. descrip: Font family names identify fonts in cascading style sheets, or CSS. Since many fonts have variations, designers use the family name, such as Arial, Helvetica or Verdana, rather than the specific name of a font, such as Arial Black or Verdana Bold. Finding the family name for a font is simple because the family name is ...
